# alicloud\_bastionhost\_host\_account\_share\_key\_attachment

Provides a Bastion Host Account Share Key Attachment resource.

For information about Bastion Host Host Account Share Key Attachment and how to use it, see [What is Host Account Share Key Attachment](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/en/bastion-host/latest/attachhostaccountstohostsharekey).

-> **NOTE:** Available in v1.165.0+.

## Example Usage

Basic Usage

```python
import constructs as constructs
import cdktf as cdktf
# Provider bindings are generated by running cdktf get.
# See https://cdk.tf/provider-generation for more details.
import ...gen.providers.alicloud as alicloud
class MyConvertedCode(cdktf.TerraformStack):
    def __init__(self, scope, name):
        super().__init__(scope, name)
        # Terraform Variables are not always the best fit for getting inputs in the context of Terraform CDK.
        #     You can read more about this at https://cdk.tf/variables
        name = cdktf.TerraformVariable(self, "name",
            default="tfacc_host_account_share_key_attachment"
        )
        data_alicloud_bastionhost_instances_default =
        alicloud.data_alicloud_bastionhost_instances.DataAlicloudBastionhostInstances(self, "default")
        alicloud_bastionhost_host_default =
        alicloud.bastionhost_host.BastionhostHost(self, "default_2",
            active_address_type="Private",
            host_name=name.string_value,
            host_private_address="172.16.0.10",
            instance_id=cdktf.Token.as_string(
                cdktf.property_access(data_alicloud_bastionhost_instances_default.ids, ["0"
                ])),
            os_type="Linux",
            source="Local"
        )
        # This allows the Terraform resource name to match the original name. You can remove the call if you don't need them to match.
        alicloud_bastionhost_host_default.override_logical_id("default")
        alicloud_bastionhost_host_account_default =
        alicloud.bastionhost_host_account.BastionhostHostAccount(self, "default_3",
            host_account_name=name.string_value,
            host_id=cdktf.Token.as_string(alicloud_bastionhost_host_default.host_id),
            instance_id=cdktf.Token.as_string(
                cdktf.property_access(data_alicloud_bastionhost_instances_default.ids, ["0"
                ])),
            password="YourPassword12345",
            protocol_name="SSH"
        )
        # This allows the Terraform resource name to match the original name. You can remove the call if you don't need them to match.
        alicloud_bastionhost_host_account_default.override_logical_id("default")
        alicloud_bastionhost_host_share_key_default =
        alicloud.bastionhost_host_share_key.BastionhostHostShareKey(self, "default_4",
            host_share_key_name="example_name",
            instance_id=cdktf.Token.as_string(
                cdktf.property_access(data_alicloud_bastionhost_instances_default.instances, ["0", "id"])),
            pass_phrase="example_value",
            private_key="example_value"
        )
        # This allows the Terraform resource name to match the original name. You can remove the call if you don't need them to match.
        alicloud_bastionhost_host_share_key_default.override_logical_id("default")
        alicloud_bastionhost_host_account_share_key_attachment_default =
        alicloud.bastionhost_host_account_share_key_attachment.BastionhostHostAccountShareKeyAttachment(self, "default_5",
            host_account_id=cdktf.Token.as_string(alicloud_bastionhost_host_account_default.host_account_id),
            host_share_key_id=cdktf.Token.as_string(alicloud_bastionhost_host_share_key_default.host_share_key_id),
            instance_id=cdktf.Token.as_string(
                cdktf.property_access(data_alicloud_bastionhost_instances_default.instances, ["0", "id"]))
        )
        # This allows the Terraform resource name to match the original name. You can remove the call if you don't need them to match.
        alicloud_bastionhost_host_account_share_key_attachment_default.override_logical_id("default")
```

## Argument Reference

The following arguments are supported:

* `instance_id` - (Required, ForceNew) The ID of the Bastion machine instance.
* `host_account_id` - (Required, ForceNew) The ID list of the host account.
* `host_share_key_id` - (Required, ForceNew) The ID of the host shared key.

## Attributes Reference

The following attributes are exported:

* `id` - The resource ID of Host Account Share Key Attachment. The value formats as `<instance_id>:<host_share_key_id>:<host_account_id>`.

### Timeouts

The `timeouts` block allows you to specify [timeouts](https://www.terraform.io/docs/configuration-0-11/resources.html#timeouts) for certain actions:

* `create` - (Defaults to 1 mins) Used when create the Bastion Host Account Share Key Attachment.
* `delete` - (Defaults to 1 mins) Used when delete the Bastion Host Account Share Key Attachment.

## Import

Bastion Host Account Share Key Attachment can be imported using the id, e.g.

```shell
$ terraform import alicloud_bastionhost_host_account_share_key_attachment.example <instance_id>:<host_share_key_id>:<host_account_id>
```
